00033 #ifndef DH_DESCR
00034 #define DH_DESCR
00035 
00036 /* ---------------------------------INCLUDES--------------------------------- */

00042 #include <ctype.h>

00044 #include "voronoi.h"
00045 #include "voronoi_lst.h"
00046 #include "atom.h"
00047 #include "aa.h"
00048 #include "utils.h"
00049 
00050 /* --------------------------------STRUCTURES---------------------------------*/
00051 /**
00052         Structure containing descriptors for binding pockets
00053 */
00054 typedef struct s_desc 
00055 {
00056         float hydrophobicity_score, /**< Hydropathie score - for each aa */
00057               volume_score,         /**< Volume score - for each aa */
00058               volume,               /**< Pocket volume */
00059               prop_polar_atm,       /**< Proportion of polar atoms */
00060               mean_asph_ray,        /**< Mean alpha sphere radius */
00061               masph_sacc,           /**< Mean alpha sphere solvent accessibility */
00062               apolar_asphere_prop,  /**< Proportion of apolar alpha spheres */
00063               mean_loc_hyd_dens,    /**< Mean local hydrophobic density (from alpha spheres) */
00064               as_density,           /**< Pocket density, defined as mean distance between alpha spheres*/
00065               as_max_dst,           /**< Maximum distance between two alpha spheres */
00066               /**< The following descriptors are all normalized using observed
00067                  values among all pocket found by the algorithm. These
00068                  are not set in descriptor.c, but in pocket.c as we have to check
00069                  all pocket first to store boundaries of the descriptor to
00070                  normalize. */
00071 
00072               flex,                  /**< Normalized flexibility - based on B factors - ABUSIVE */
00073               nas_norm,              /**< Normalized number of alpha sphere */
00074               polarity_score_norm,   /**< Normalized polarity score*/
00075               mean_loc_hyd_dens_norm,/**< Normalized mean local hydrophobic density */
00076               prop_asapol_norm,      /**< Normalized proportion of apolar alphasphere */
00077               as_density_norm,       /**< Normalized alpha sphere density */
00078               as_max_dst_norm        /**< normalized maximum distance between alpha sphere centers*/
00079         ;
00080         
00081         int aa_compo[20] ;      /**< Absolute amino acid composition */
00082         int nb_asph,            /**< Number of alpha spheres */
00083             polarity_score,     /**< Polarity score (based on amino acids properties ; see aa.c & aa.h) */
00084             charge_score ;      /**< Sum of all net charges at pH = 7 (see aa.c & aa.h) */
00085         float as_max_r ;        /**< Alpha sphere maximum radius*/
00086 
00087 } s_desc ;
00088 
00089 /* ------------------------------PROTOTYPES---------------------------------- */
00090 
00091 s_desc* allocate_s_desc(void) ;
00092 void reset_desc(s_desc *desc) ;
00093 
00094 void set_descriptors(s_atm **tatoms, int natoms, s_vvertice **tvert, int nvert, s_desc *desc, int niter) ;
00095 
00096 int get_vert_apolar_density(s_vvertice **tvert, int nvert, s_vvertice *vert) ;
00097 void set_atom_based_descriptors(s_atm **atoms, int natoms, s_desc *desc) ;
00098 void set_aa_desc(s_desc *desc, const char *aa_name) ;
00099 
00100 
00101 #endif
